item.title: vSAN SPBM and vCloud Director
item.description: I had a question last week from Bozo Popovic â†— during our EMEA field SE training session on vSAN operations relating to SPBM support for service providers that use vCloud Director in their environments. Next up Mr. @mylesagray giving a #vSAN operations overview to our EMEA field at the @vmwarevsan workshop this morning pic.twitter.com/48seQc8i7d — Cormac Hogan (@CormacJHogan) November 30, 2017 I am stating this for clarity - since the vCD 9.
